mapper.insert: insert into review(review_idx, id, restarea_idx, rating, contents) values ((select nvl(max(review_idx),0)+1 from review where restarea_idx=#{restarea_idx}), #{id}, #{restarea_idx}, #{rating}, #{contents})
mapper.delete: delete from review_img where review_idx=#{review_idx} and restarea_idx=#{restarea_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into review_img(review_idx, id, restarea_idx, img_idx, img) values (#{review_idx}, #{id}, #{restarea_idx}, ${img_idx} , #{img})
